import React from "react" import useStats from "../utils/useStats" import IndexPage from "../pages/index" import styled from "styled-components" const statContainer = styled.div` display: grid; ` const statBlock = styled.div` display: grid; background : blue grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); ` const Stats = url => { const { stats, loading, error } = useStats(url.url) if (!stats) return
